title: How to transfer WhatsApp chats from a Samsung to an iPhone - Quora

response.answer_text: the easiest way is to back up your chat to cloud platform as first step. the second step is to login on Goole Play store by using same email ID of the cloud account, if you can’t, so create a new account with google and import your backed up from that cloud into new google cloud account. The third step is to download WA on your android and by using new google cloud account ID and automatically WA will ask you to restore the found account on the cloud. that’s it. Another solution by using PC and USB cable: download the Backed WA data from the cloud to PC then go to Whats app databases folder and copy these folders into connected android to PC - WA folder WAdatabases Restart mobile voila kindly find two attached pictures
Not possible. You can not transfer whatsapp chat/backups across different platforms. You can check it on Whatsapp website in FAQ section. Android to Android and iOS to iOs transfer is permitted.
